name: GeometryEffect
desc: An effect that changes the visual appearance of a view, largely without changing its ancestors or descendants.

items.name: func effectValue(size: CGSize) -> ProjectionTransform
items.desc: Returns the current value of the effect.

items.name: func ignoredByLayout() -> _IgnoredByLayoutEffect<Self>
items.desc: Returns an effect that produces the same geometry transform as this effect, but only applies the transform while rendering its view.

declaration: protocol GeometryEffect : Animatable, ViewModifier where Self.Body == Never
